name: Swarm Split
description: Drag to slice your swarm of critters into groups, sending squads to overwhelm enemy bases before they regroup â€” split too thin and you lose, stay bunched and you're too slow.
core_loop: Your swarm follows your finger as a blob. Swipe through the swarm to cleave it into two groups â€” one follows you, the other charges toward the nearest enemy base. Critters auto-fight when they reach a base, and you need numeric superiority to capture it. Captured bases spawn reinforcements. Each 60-second round you must capture all bases on the map. The tension is deciding when to split (send an attack) versus when to keep your numbers together for a tougher base. Swarm pieces left idle slowly wander and can be recollected by dragging through them.
retention_hooks: Escalating maps with more bases, tougher garrisons, and hazard zones that kill stray critters
Star rating per level (time-based) plus unlockable critter skins that leave colorful trails
Split-second 'perfect split' bonus when you cleave exactly the right number to barely win a base capture
controls: Drag to move your swarm. Swipe through the swarm to split it. Tap a detached group to recall it back to you. All one-finger touch-friendly.
